name: pokeberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a poisonous North American plant with long, narrow bunches (= groups) of purple-black fruits on pink stems: Pokeberries proliferate even in rocky, infertile soil. Synonym
pokeweed
[ C ] one of the poisonous purple-black fruits of the pokeberry plant, used to make ink and dye (= a substance used to change the colour of something): Never, ever eat pokeberries! They made ink out of pokeberries, roots, and bark.
More examplesFewer examplesPokeberries are used as a vegetable dye - they give a nice red-purple colour.
